localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Twiso is a tool that helps you personalize your clubhouse invite page with a click of a button. You can use 3 custom eye-catching templates to unleash uniqueness and grow your audience.
blogPost.body: Twiso is a tool that helps you personalize your clubhouse invite page with a click of a button. You can use 3 custom eye-catching templates to unleash uniqueness and grow your audience.
blogPost.title: Twiso - Personalize Clubhouse invite page with the click of a button
blogPost.author: Dmitry Yeremin

localize.description: Twiso是一款帮助你个性化会所邀请页面的工具，只需点击一个按钮即可。你可以使用3个自定义的醒目模板来释放独特性，增加你的受众。
localize.tagline: 只需点击一个按钮，就能实现个性化的会所邀请页面。

localize.description: Twiso是一款幫助你個性化會所邀請頁面的工具，只需點擊一個按鈕即可。你可以使用3個自定義的醒目模板來釋放獨特性，增加你的受衆。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊一個按鈕，就能實現個性化的會所邀請頁面。

next.excerpt: Developers interested in creating applications and experiences for augmented reality, should check out the Mutrics ARiC open source augmented reality glasses, specifically created for the development process.
next.title: Mutrics ARiC - Open source all in one AR glasses for developers

localize.description: 有兴趣为增强现实创建应用和体验的开发者，应该看看Mutrics ARiC开源增强现实眼镜，这是专门为开发过程创建的。
localize.tagline: 为开发者提供开源的一体化AR眼镜

localize.description: 有興趣爲增強現實創建應用和體驗的開發者，應該看看Mutrics ARiC開源增強現實眼鏡，這是專門爲開發過程創建的。
localize.tagline: 爲開發者提供開源的一體化AR眼鏡
